text: Gribovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Kirillovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 316 as of 2010. There are 8 streets. == Geography == It is located 5 km from Ufa, 1 km from Kirillovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Gribovka, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
